PROJECT

Wrap your present like a designer

Part of Elle's Holiday Gift Guide, this custom gift box was created using prints and fabrics from our Fall '14 'Chaos to Denim' Line. It features a red/black plaid wrap-around print with a hand-disrtressed black-waxed fabric overlay, adding a Hudson leather name tag as a finishing touch. See full article on elle.com
